original: Bergman, Erik Einar, trafikinspek-tör, Göteborg, f. 22/10/88 i Örebro av E. A. B. o. Emma Engström. — Stud:-ex. 07. Ans t. i teilegr :v. ised. 08, assist. i Örnsköldsvik 13, förste assist, i Stlilm 20, kontr. 27, förste dito i Gbg 36, överkontr. 39, trafikinsp. i Gbg sed. 44.
translated: Bergman, Erik Einar, traffic inspector, Gothenburg, b. 22/10/88 in Örebro to E.A.B. and Emma Engström. - Passed the student exam in 1907. Employed at the telegraph service in 1908, assistant in Örnsköldsvik in 1913, first assistant in Stlilm in 1920, contracting in 1927, first contracting in Gothenburg in 1936, senior contracting in 1939, traffic inspector in Gothenburg since 1944.
